testsuite.test:
isRadioEnabled is it boolean
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isRadioEnabled Verify false
Instructions: Make sure you have NO phone line coverage (e.g. remove the SIM card).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isRadioEnabled Verify true
Instructions: Make sure you have phone line coverage!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isRoaming returns boolean
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isRoaming Verify false
Instructions: Make sure your phone does NOT do roaming!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isRoaming Verify true
Instructions: Make sure your phone is in roaming mode (e.g. by using a foreign SIM card).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

radioSignalSource Exists at all
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

radioSignalSource Verify
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the above the type of source your phone currently uses for phone calls?

radioSignalSource Verify GSM
Instructions: Switch your phone to use GSM!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

radioSignalStrengthPercent
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

radioSignalStrengthPercent Verify
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the above value correct?

onSignalSourceChange Turn roaming off
Instructions: 1) Make sure roaming is turned off (usually this simply requires a SIM card from your country). 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onSignalSourceChange Turn roaming on
Instructions: 1) Make sure roaming is turned on (mostly requires a foreign SIM card). 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onSignalSourceChange Turn on 2G
Instructions: 1) Make sure 3G is turned on. 2) Click 'GO'. 3) Minimize the widget. 4) Switch to 2G. 5) Come back to this widget.
Expected behaviour: Is the shown value correct?

onSignalSourceChange Turn on 3G
Instructions: 1) Make sure 2G is turned on. 2) Click 'GO'. 3) Minimize the widget. 4) Switch to 3G. 5) Come back to this widget.
Expected behaviour: Is the shown value correct?
